sentences.english: It suggested that SM could be regarded as a good exogenous scavenger of oxygen free radical.
sentences.chinese: 提示丹参可作为一良好的外源性氧自由基清除剂。

sentences.english: Effect of Micronization on the Quality of Salvia miltiorrhiza Bge.
sentences.chinese: 微粉化对丹参质量影响的研究。

sentences.english: AIM: To study extraction process with the aid of cyclodextrin (EPAC) of Radix Salvias Miltiorrhizae.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究环糊精辅助提取丹参的工艺。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Injectio Salviae Miltiorrhizae Composita, as add-on treatment of bronchiolitis of newborn, has a good efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 结论复方丹参辅佐治疗新生儿毛细支气管炎疗效明显。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Limuliod reagent method can be used to inspect semi-finished product of salvia miltiorrhiza injection.
sentences.chinese: 结论鲎试剂可作为检测丹参注射液半成品的方法。

sentences.english: SA-B extraction rate was significantly increased in the process of composite enzymatic extraction.
sentences.chinese: 复合式酶法提取明显提高了丹参中丹酚酸B的提取率。

sentences.english: Results and Conclusion Salvianolic acids is basicly stable, the CRH is about 45%.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究丹参总酚酸的临界相对湿度及稳定性。

sentences.english: The effects of wine fried Danshen in activating blood and eleminating stasis were studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨酒炙对丹参活血祛瘀作用的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the attenuation of gentamicin-induced ototoxicity with Salvia miltiorrhiza.
sentences.chinese: 目的为探讨丹参对庆大霉素耳毒性的减毒作用。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the curative effect of treating psoriasis guttate with tanshinone.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价丹参酮治疗点滴型银屑病的疗效。

sentences.english: SMB-Carbomer Gel has the best biological compatibility with thetissues.
sentences.chinese: 丹参卡波姆凝胶与组织具有良好的生物相容性。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE Optimizing extraction craft of liposoluble constituent in Baihua Danshen.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选白花丹参中脂溶性成分的最佳提取工艺。

sentences.english: The effective-part of Danshen was studied in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本文进行了丹参有效部位的研究。

sentences.english: The effects of roots of red sage on myocardium ATP contents in mice were observed after loading.
sentences.chinese: 观察丹参对运动负荷后小鼠心肌ATP含量的影响。

sentences.english: This means the yeast glucan may be potential regulator of secondary metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 葡聚糖是有潜力的丹参生长和次生代谢调节剂。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the mechanism of Radix Salviae Miltiorrhizae(RSM) inhibition of metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨复方丹参抗肿瘤转移机理。
